predict.name: Predict Spaghetti
predict.description: Runs the Obico ML model whether the given image has spaghetti

switch.spaghetti_detection_active.name: Spaghetti Detection Active
switch.spaghetti_detection_active.description: Switch to activate or deactivate spaghetti detection

sensor.failure_detection_result.name: Failure Detection Result
sensor.failure_detection_result.description: Sensor to show the failure detection result (None, Warning, Failure)
